attributes.action: Ban the use of DU (depleted uranium) weapons in warfare.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Military weapons made of DU (Depleted Uranium) are, inhumane, carcinogenic, mutagenic and indiscriminate. The use of DU is causing global radioactive contamination, disease and genetic abnormalities. Military use of this nuclear waste product is having a detrimental effect on soldiers, civilians and the global environment. These weapons clearly violate humanitarian law and their use must be stopped.

government_responses.details:
